A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is an inconsistent pile of garbage.

The plot makes no sense at all and they completely disregarded The Force Awakens. 

Nevermind the fact that Leia can fly and people can breathe and use gravity in space.

They turned the Force into magic. They turned Luke Skywalker into a jerk who contemplates MURDERING the son of his sister and best friends. The thing is\, I would be fine with all of this if they took the time and creativity to explain all of this nonsenwe\, but they didn't even do that.

This "movie" is a true slap in the face.
